fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Transport, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Promotion of circular economy, support of education, optimization of supply chain, optimization of deposit policy and support of initiatives regarding digitalization.
organisation_name: European Federation of Associations of Beer and Beverages Wholesalers (CEGROBB)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: CEGROBB is the official mouthpiece of European beverages wholesalers to Community institutions and to European organizations of related associations. Furthermore, CEGROBB offers European beverages wholesalers a platform for information exchange and the preparation of reactions on European developments.
relevant_communication: Re Use Conference, Prevention of alcohol abuse
